'''Ron Thompson''' (born 20 November 1966) is an [[Politics of the United States|American politician]] from the [[U.S. state|state]] of [[West Virginia]]. A [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democrat]], he served as a member of the [[West Virginia House of Delegates]] from 1994 to 2007, representing the state's 27th District in [[Raleigh County, West Virginia|Raleigh County]]. Thompson 
is notable for his extended absence from the House of Delegates due to his [[bipolar disorder]].<ref name="bipolar">{{cite news|url=http://www.register-herald.com/local/local_story_055231645.html|title=Thompson still suffering from bipolar disorder|date=2007-02-24|accessdate=2007-06-30}}</ref> Thompson announced his resignation from the House of Delegates in July citing the necessity of longer than expected medical care.<ref name="resignation">{{cite news|url=http://www.register-herald.com/local/local_story_208231532.html|title=Thompson calls it quits|date=2007-07-27|accessdate=2007-07-28}}</ref>
